title: The Best Black Friday Deals on Air Fryers, Cookware, and More

excerpt: I've rounded up the best early Black Friday deals from my favorite brands, like Staub, Ninja, Our Place, and more!
text: This post may contain affiliate links. Read my disclosure policy. It’s not even the holidays yet, but the Black Friday savings have already begun! There’s nothing I love more than finding a great deal on one of my favorite cooking products and sharing it with you to help you save a little. I’ve already rounded up some of my favorite sales happening and found early Black Friday deals on everything from one of my favorite nonstick pans to a Dutch oven for making sourdough bread!  I’ll continue to update this post with more deals as I find them, but if you see something you love, I recommend getting it at this great price before it sells out or the sale ends. Happy shopping! My 5 Favorite Early Black Friday Deals 1. Blackstone Original 2-Burner Griddle Credit: Walmart These griddles are super popular right now, and you can save $50 on one for Black Friday! They’re great for everything from making hamburgers for a tailgate to making breakfast for a crowd. This would also make a great gift for a griller. 2. Skinnytaste Simple Credit: Amazon Anytime my cookbooks are on sale I love to share them with you guys! Currently, you can get Skinnytaste Simple, Skinnytaste Air Fryer Dinners, and Skinnytaste One and Done on sale. Get Skinnytaste Simple: Get Skinnytaste Air Fryer Dinners: Get Skinnytaste One and Done: 3. COSORI Air Fryer 9-in-1 Black Friday always brings a ton of air fryer deals, and this one is large enough for families. The digital display makes it easy to set the temperature and keep an eye on your food. It’s $32 off right now, too! 4. KitchenAid Artisan 5-Quart Stand Mixer I use my KitchenAid stand mixer all the time during the holidays for all the baking I do. It’s the best! Right now, is the best time to get one for yourself or as a gift because it’s $130 off for early Black Friday and the lowest price I’ve seen this year. 5. Carote Nonstick Pots and Pans Set I get asked about nontoxic pan recommendations often, and this affordable set is on sale. It’s made of a nonstick granite material that is easy to clean. The set comes with two frying pans, two saucepans, a saute pan, and a steamer for most of your cooking needs. Credit: Williams Sonoma Always Pan 2.0 – $95 at Our Place (Originally $150): I love this nonstick pan and it’s at its lowest price I’ve seen as part of these early Black Friday deals. Staub 4-Quart Round Dutch Oven – $129.95 at Williams Sonoma (Originally $370): This size is good for bread baking and soups. Lodge Cast Iron Dutch Oven – $44.84 at Walmart (Originally $49.88): An affordable Dutch oven for bread baking. Zwilling Four Star Eco Paring Knife – $29.95 at Williams Sonoma (Originally $59.95) Staub Enameled Cast Iron Traditional Deep Skillet – $99.99 at Williams Sonoma (Originally $189.99): Love this pan! Early Black Friday Kitchen Deals I Love Credit: Amazon Festive Bistro Tile Monogram Mug – $8 at Anthropologie (Originally $14): Such a cute holiday mug! Marble Tree Cheese Board – $34.50 at Pottery Barn$49.50): Great for holiday entertaining. Farberware Salad Spinner – $17.99 at Amazon (Originally $19.97): Great for washing greens! Etekcity Food Kitchen Scale – $10.99 at Amazon with coupon (Originally $13.99): This is great for measuring ingredients and portioning out foods. Braun Portable Immersion Hand Blender – $52.46 at Amazon (Originally $69.95): This is useful for blending soups and whisking. Ninja CREAMi Ice Cream Maker – $149 at Walmart (Originally $169): This would make for a great gift this year! Breville the Compact Smart Oven – $149.99 at Amazon (Originally $189.95) Cshidworld Expandable Lunch Bag – $14.99 at Walmart (Originally $98.99): Great for school or work. Crock-Pot MultiMeal Multicooker – $129.98 at Amazon (Originally $209.99): I’m loving slow cooked meals this cold season, and this one allows for two at once! Nespresso Vertuo Pop+ Coffee and Espresso Maker – $99 at Amazon (Originally $129.95): I love my Nespresso and this white color is so pretty! Stainless Steel Cutting Board – $18.39 at Amazon (Originally $22.99): These are a great alternative to plastic cutting boards. Simple Modern 30-Ounce Tumbler – $19.98 at Walmart (Originally $24.98): I love this style of tumbler! Joseph Joseph DrawerStore – $11.99 at Walmart (Originally $17.99): Great for some space-saving silverware storage Ninja Fit Personal Single-Serve Blender – $25 at Walmart (Originally $49) Instant Pot Vortex Plus Air Fryer – $79.99 at Amazon (Originally $119.99) Other Early Black Friday Sales at Retailers I Love Target: Save up to 50% off holiday decor, including artificial trees and matching pajamas. html:
This post may contain affiliate links. Read my disclosure policy.

It’s not even the holidays yet, but the Black Friday savings have already begun! There’s nothing I love more than finding a great deal on one of my favorite cooking products and sharing it with you to help you save a little. I’ve already rounded up some of my favorite sales happening and found early Black Friday deals on everything from one of my favorite nonstick pans to a Dutch oven for making sourdough bread! 

I’ll continue to update this post with more deals as I find them, but if you see something you love, I recommend getting it at this great price before it sells out or the sale ends. Happy shopping!

My 5 Favorite Early Black Friday Deals

1. Blackstone Original 2-Burner Griddle

These griddles are super popular right now, and you can save $50 on one for Black Friday! They’re great for everything from making hamburgers for a tailgate to making breakfast for a crowd. This would also make a great gift for a griller.

2. Skinnytaste Simple

Anytime my cookbooks are on sale I love to share them with you guys! Currently, you can get Skinnytaste Simple, Skinnytaste Air Fryer Dinners, and Skinnytaste One and Done on sale.

Get Skinnytaste Simple:

Get Skinnytaste Air Fryer Dinners:

Get Skinnytaste One and Done:

3. COSORI Air Fryer 9-in-1

Black Friday always brings a ton of air fryer deals, and this one is large enough for families. The digital display makes it easy to set the temperature and keep an eye on your food. It’s $32 off right now, too!

4. KitchenAid Artisan 5-Quart Stand Mixer

I use my KitchenAid stand mixer all the time during the holidays for all the baking I do. It’s the best! Right now, is the best time to get one for yourself or as a gift because it’s $130 off for early Black Friday and the lowest price I’ve seen this year.

5. Carote Nonstick Pots and Pans Set

I get asked about nontoxic pan recommendations often, and this affordable set is on sale. It’s made of a nonstick granite material that is easy to clean. The set comes with two frying pans, two saucepans, a saute pan, and a steamer for most of your cooking needs.

  • Always Pan 2.0 – $95 at Our Place (Originally $150): I love this nonstick pan and it’s at its lowest price I’ve seen as part of these early Black Friday deals.
  • Staub 4-Quart Round Dutch Oven – $129.95 at Williams Sonoma (Originally $370): This size is good for bread baking and soups.
  • Lodge Cast Iron Dutch Oven – $44.84 at Walmart (Originally $49.88): An affordable Dutch oven for bread baking.
  • Zwilling Four Star Eco Paring Knife – $29.95 at Williams Sonoma (Originally $59.95)
  • Staub Enameled Cast Iron Traditional Deep Skillet – $99.99 at Williams Sonoma (Originally $189.99): Love this pan!

Early Black Friday Kitchen Deals I Love

  • Festive Bistro Tile Monogram Mug – $8 at Anthropologie (Originally $14): Such a cute holiday mug!
  • Marble Tree Cheese Board – $34.50 at Pottery Barn$49.50): Great for holiday entertaining.
  • Farberware Salad Spinner – $17.99 at Amazon (Originally $19.97): Great for washing greens!
  • Beautiful Air Fryer – $59 at Walmart (Originally $69): Such a pretty air fyer!
  • Etekcity Food Kitchen Scale – $10.99 at Amazon with coupon (Originally $13.99): This is great for measuring ingredients and portioning out foods.
  • Braun Portable Immersion Hand Blender – $52.46 at Amazon (Originally $69.95): This is useful for blending soups and whisking.
  • Ninja CREAMi Ice Cream Maker – $149 at Walmart (Originally $169): This would make for a great gift this year!
  • Breville the Compact Smart Oven – $149.99 at Amazon (Originally $189.95)
  • Cshidworld Expandable Lunch Bag – $14.99 at Walmart (Originally $98.99): Great for school or work.
  • Crock-Pot MultiMeal Multicooker – $129.98 at Amazon (Originally $209.99): I’m loving slow cooked meals this cold season, and this one allows for two at once!
  • Nespresso Vertuo Pop+ Coffee and Espresso Maker – $99 at Amazon (Originally $129.95): I love my Nespresso and this white color is so pretty!
  • Stainless Steel Cutting Board – $18.39 at Amazon (Originally $22.99): These are a great alternative to plastic cutting boards.
  • Simple Modern 30-Ounce Tumbler – $19.98 at Walmart (Originally $24.98): I love this style of tumbler!
  • KitchenAid Food Chopper – $44.95 at Amazon (Originally $59.99): This mini food processor is great for sauces and dips.
  • Mueller Pro-Series Vegetable Chopper – $29.87 at Amazon (Originally $59.95): This will speed up vegetable prep.
  • Joseph Joseph DrawerStore – $11.99 at Walmart (Originally $17.99): Great for some space-saving silverware storage
  • Ninja Fit Personal Single-Serve Blender – $25 at Walmart (Originally $49)
  • Instant Pot Vortex Plus Air Fryer – $79.99 at Amazon (Originally $119.99)

Other Early Black Friday Sales at Retailers I Love

  • Target: Save up to 50% off holiday decor, including artificial trees and matching pajamas.
  • Williams Sonoma: Thanksgiving cooking must-haves from amazing brands like Staub, Le Creuset, and All-Clad are currently on sale at Williams Sonoma.
  • The Home Depot: Snag deals on everything from large home appliances to Christmas trees and tools. 
  • Walmart: Tech, toys, cooking gear, and so much more are on sale at Walmart’s early Black Friday savings event.
  • Anthropologie Black Friday Sale: Save 30% on everything and get an extra 40% off sale.
  • Elemis Cyber Week Sale: Get 30% off sitewide, including my favorite Pro-Collagen Marine Cream and Superfood Facial Oil, with the code CYBER.
  • Cozy Earth Black Friday Sale: Get up to 35% off the coziest items, like joggers, pajamas, and throw blankets.
  • RugsUSA Black Friday Event: Take up to 30% off a new rug to spruce up your space for hosting holiday dinners with code SAVE30. I love this wool one!
  • Brooklinen Black Friday Sale: Get 25% off everything, including the popular Luxe Sateen Core Sheets.
  • Solo Stove: Get 25% off bundles for the ultimate firepit setup.
  • Calpak Early Black Friday: Up to 60% off, including the Luka Duffle, which is a great weekender bag.
  • Pottery Barn Early Black Friday: Get up to 50% off holiday decor and furniture.
  • Micheal Kors Holiday Head Start: Get up to 60% off bags, wallets, and boot for gifting or to treat yourself.
  • Wayfair: Furniture and holiday decor are up to 70% off at the Black Friday sale.

Prices were accurate at time of publishing.

Categories:
